section.title: Objective
section.text: I seek the opportunity to advance my abilities as a designer and developer by contributing to meaningful projects.

item.title: Communications Arts Freshman Class Shirt
item.subtitle: Print Design
item.text: Designed a front and back shirt given to incoming students as a welcome gift.

item.title: NISD Magnet Fair Poster
item.subtitle: Print Design
item.text: Designed a distinctive poster to promote the district's magnet fair. Selected in a competitive process by the principals of the schools involved. Tabloid size copies were distributed to every middle school in the district and an additional letter sized flier was mailed to every 8th grader in the district.

item.title: Alex Walker Studios
item.subtitle: Web Design/Development
item.text: Responsible for designing, developing and deploying a modern web portfolio using a custom CMS and cutting edge HTML5 APIs and CSS3 effects.

item.title: Ines Walker
item.subtitle: Identity and Web Design
item.text: Responsible for creation of unifying identity across print and web media and supplying supporting imagery -including illustrations and photos.

item.title: South Texas Division, USFA
item.subtitle: Web Design
item.text: Responsible for designing a mobile aware web presence and new identity, managing web hosting, representing the organization on social media platforms, updating and developing content, migrating large quantities of legacy information seamlessly into a new interface.

item.title: Photography Club
item.subtitle: Webmaster
item.text: Responsible for designing and updating the club's webpage and maintaining it's Facebook presence.

item.title: Varsity Orchestra
item.subtitle: Librarian
item.text: Responsible for organizing and managing the Taft Orchestra music collection, distributing and tracking large quantities of sheet music and theory books.

item.title: Orchestra
item.subtitle: Violinist
item.text: Started through 5th grade strings program, continued into high school.

item.title: Fencing
item.subtitle: Foilist
item.text: Consistent regional champion, multiple national appearances.

item.title: Achievement in Principals of Information Technology
item.subtitle: Communications Arts Freshman Faculty

item.title: Communications Arts High School
item.subtitle: Distinguished Diploma, June 2014
item.text:
Advanced Placement Courses: World History AP
Other Advanced Courses: World Geography Honors, Pre-AP Biology, Pre-AP English, Pre-AP English II, Pre-AP Geometry, Pre-AP Algebra II,
Pre-AP Chemistry, Pre-AP Spanish I
